name: The (Un)Stable Tortoise and the Hare
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam, whose theme was: "Unstable"

I'm about a week into doing Unity tutorials in earnest, and the only thing I know how to do is make a clicking game from this week's tutorial.

The challenge was: how do I make a clicking game about instability?

I've felt unstable a lot in my life; very difficult to keep up with the people who seem to zoom along and meet all of their life's milestones. That's why I made the theme Tortoise and the Hare.

There are in-game instructions, but to move the Tortoise forward, repeatedly click the briefcase. Then when the Inner Demons show up, click them repeatedly to banish them. Click the self-care icons to eventually level up your click damage.
